Text:

31.11% down during more than a day and slow as hell if even downloading at all. Someone had to got it down that could continue to seed without leaving?

what's other languanges on the subtitle info.
could you please be more specific on what those other languages are

OK. Took me 4 days to get this down but now I know what it is.

Disk 1 (AMARCORD) is the movie.
Disk 2 (Amarcord 2) contain extras.

See the enclosed covers with details here: http://bayimg.com/bakcMaACF

I haven't burnt it yet, just checked it out in VLC, but I do not get all the language options listed on the cover. I get the following.

Ideaomas (which I guess means soundtrack choices):
English, Deutsch, Castellano, Magyar, Italiano

SubtĂ­tulos:
English, Deutsch, Castellano, Magyar, FranĂ§ais Italiano

I don't see how burning could change this, but if it does I'll post again.
Well, burning made a difference. The other languages turned up in BS Player's menu after burning, but they still aren't available from the DVD menu itself. Everything seems to work.
